name: @itaylor/type-router
description: A lightweight, type-safe router for single-page applications with first-class TypeScript support

tasks.check: deno check && deno task lint && deno task fmt --check && deno task test
tasks.bundle:fixtures: deno bundle --sourcemap=inline test-fixtures/shared-routes.ts > test-fixtures/dist/shared-routes.js && deno bundle --sourcemap=inline test-fixtures/manual-init-routes.ts > test-fixtures/dist/manual-init-routes.js
